title: Guild seals standardized
summary: Standardized seal glyphs and impress tools unify Krum trade contracts

title: Ish-Atu expansion (LOC:KRM-001)
summary: Major building phase expands the primary ziggurat and quay

title: Tin convoys peak
summary: Peak tin throughput from Ord uplands fuels bronze circulation

title: Ash years disrupt routes
summary: Eruptions + storm decades scatter shipping and raise famine risk

title: Archipelago abandonment accelerates
summary: Ports and ritual centers vacated; diaspora + legends

title: Wurran War begins
summary: Trade rivalry escalates into open conflict.

title: Battle of Mistakes
summary: Both sides blunder; crab charge backfires; Ord holds field.

title: Burning of Wurran
summary: Night river crossing; wharves and granaries torched.

title: Pact with Kllrian priest-kings
summary: Grain & oars in exchange for ritual autonomy

title: Ord Sewer v1 failure
summary: Backflow disaster in typhoon; crony contractor

title: Sar engineers complete Sewer v3
summary: Backflow gates & storm overflow basins commissioned

title: Standard hull & signal code adopted
summary: Oar banks; fenders; horn/whistle charts

title: Zambran elected High Master
summary: Emergency election during Kaheet raids; fortified camp-city established

title: Settlement of the Kaheet Frontier
summary: Raids ended via tribute; arbitration; and trade posts (674-679 AO)
impact: Stability gains free fleets for Sar pressure

title: Submission of Tau-Hi via blockade
summary: Famine pressure breaks stalemate; tributary status

title: Half-mythic Widiwidi landfall
summary: Pilot-book fragment & shell token

title: Ord–Sar Union proclaimed
summary: Alliance/subjugation after sieges; blockades; and factional alignments
impact: Creates imperial core; revenue and manpower surge

title: First printed Old Bold Rhythm
summary: First printed recension circulates as temple leafs and harbor packets

title: Rhythm calendar & rites go civic
summary: Standardized rites/calendar mandated for civic use

title: Succession of Eshoron Ir
summary: Zambran abdicates/dies; succession confirmed
impact: Smooth transition; consolidation of religious governance

title: Founding of the Hexennial Games
summary: Empire-wide festival on the Long Beat; regatta; choir tourney; reef run inaugurated

title: Death of Zambran; state funeral
summary: Oboe rites; succession council convenes

title: Accession of Eshoron Ir
summary: Push for trained oarsmen; levy quotas by port tonnage

title: Death of Eshoron Ir (fever)
summary: Dies during inspection tour

title: Accession of Tammis Ardan
summary: Moves to formalize paid marines; central arsenal

title: Outer Bar Beacon Tower raised
summary: Stone/wood beacon with fog-bell marks the bar; linked to headland lights
impact: Safer night entries; model copied in Sar ports

title: Poisoning of High Master Tammis Ardan
summary: Sar slave ‘gift` poisons Tammis; slave found dead; tongue cut; emergency docket opened
impact: Succession scramble; rumors stain Marr’s circle

title: Accession of Marr "the Skin-Grass"
summary: Coinage debasement cycles begin; garrisons paid late

title: Poisoning of High Master Tammis Ardan
summary: Sar slave 'gift' poisons Tammis; slave found dead; tongue cut; emergency docket opened
impact: Succession scramble; rumors stain Marr's circle

title: Accession of Marr "the Skin-Grass"
summary: Council declares emergency (South Ord coast); Marr elected High Master
impact: Initial popularity; governance handed to Council & Synod

title: The Villa Scandals
summary: Captains and wives humiliated at Marr’s villa; pamphlets suppressed

title: Green Seawalls program begins
summary: Mangrove palisades planted to bind mud and tame surge
impact: Flood losses drop; new fish nurseries form

title: Captain posted to Seven Fingers
summary: Influential captain sent as ‘representative` begins ruling in fact
impact: Template for port defection; imperial prestige erodes

title: Reed Code posted to camps
summary: Printed camp rules: rations; terms; punishments; discipline ‘extensions Epersist

title: Reed-Camp Rising in iron marshes
summary: Storm-cover revolt from penal ore camp

title: Creation of the Censor’s Bench
summary: State censorate licenses recensions; seizes leafs; proscribes choirs

title: Palace Fires
summary: Marr burns ‘imperfect works; architects resign/flee

title: Temple Manumission Rolls standardized
summary: Beat Six issues common manumission forms and seals across major ports
impact: Freed status recognition improves; fraud market rises

title: Seven Fingers de facto independence
summary: Tribute withheld; no punitive fleet sails

title: The Vanishing of Marr
summary: High Master disappears; city sealed; no body recovered
impact: Succession muddied; rumors and impostors proliferate

title: The Salt Chamber Massacre
summary: Council session turns to blade-work over succession formulas; multiple presidents slain
impact: Council authority bleeds; temple dragged into factionalism

title: Sar Jurists ECommission lost at sea
summary: Invited jurists to draft absence law fail to make port; presumed wreck on the Old Song
impact: Legal vacuum prolongs paralysis; conspiracy pamphlets bloom

title: Keeper of the Oboe Seal chartered
summary: Joint lock on High Master seal; interim registry of acts in absence
impact: Some business resumes; bribery and seal-seizures proliferate

title: Convoy schedules sag and stall
summary: Unpaid escorts; drifting schedules; spoiled inland stores

title: Edict of the Long Beat (absence presumed death)
summary: After one Long Beat without proof (six years); offices may treat Marr as deceased for succession and contracts
impact: Clears legal backlog; enables formal succession; seeds later claimant myths

title: Convoy insurance panic
summary: Storm-season losses overexpose lenders

title: Nerise’s Docks Vow & Marriage Pact
summary: Public vow under Oboe; Beat Six-notarized marriage pact (consummation waived) binds alliance
impact: Signals austerity; clears path to emergency election

title: Marak elected High Master (Oar-Bench Oath)
summary: Council elects Marak on ‘protection of the empire` oath at the Oar-Bench Throne

title: First False Marr appears (North Coast)
summary: Sar escapee claims to be Marr; swiftly unmasked and `takes a stroll past the harbor`

title: Harbor Watches chartered (Ord Bay)
summary: Unified watch posts; fog bells; certs for insurance

title: Statute on Indenture Term Limits
summary: Empire-wide term cap (12y) for indentures; penalties for unlawful resale
impact: Formal curb; enforcement uneven in colonies

title: Second False Marr (Invalid Captain)
summary: Destitute invalid captain fronts as Marr; drowned after Council session

title: Harbor Watches chartered (Ord Bay)
summary: Unified watch posts; fog bells; certs for insurance

title: Ord Bay Beacon Chain segment lit
summary: First continuous light line across bar/headlands
impact: Cuts wrecks; becomes model for other ports

title: Battle of the Emerald Shoals
summary: Seven Fingers fleet trapped by green rains; destroyed; captain captured
impact: Breaks the last great defection; morale returns

title: Seven Fingers public trial & sentence
summary: Insult compensated; treason judged; execution as unity theater

title: Marak lost at sea off Sar
summary: Fleet scattered in storm; High Master not found
impact: Triggers Empty Seat; legal clocks start

title: Long Beat presumption ↁENerise’s ward elected
summary: After six years` absence; Council elects Nerise’s ward; Keeper yields the Oboe Seal

title: Death of Nerise Zambrani
summary: Matron of the restoration dies childless
impact: Closes the founding chapter of the Cadence
